ygData.subject: I cant stand it any longer!  was RE: bards agi & dodge
ygData.msgSnippet: JM Cappozi (sp?) is/was a beta tester who got to be close friends with the dev team.  Go back and re-read his posts - NEVER does he claim to be a programmer
ygData.messageBody:
JM Cappozi (sp?) is/was a beta tester who got to be close friends with the
dev team. Go back and re-read his posts - NEVER does he claim to be a
programmer (that I saw) but the detail and quality of his information made
it sure seem like he - himself had to be a Verant employee. But really --
that's something that _we_ super-imposed on him.

Please don't start calling him an imposter or a fake or a fraud. I re-read
all his posts (that I saved and I think it was all the good ones) and while
he drops names and hints about insider stuff all the time - I never found
any place we he made any claims about being on the dev team.

How could I possibly know all this??? Well, you yourself can ask Brad
McQuaid next time you meet him at Gencon or somewhere. I asked if JM was at
the con and Brad certainly knew his name and told me he was a beta tester
they got to know very well.

So there - how's that for some EQ Bard Lore on an other wise boring Friday
afternoon?

Sylly Songsynger
Bard of the 22st song
Selling Swords and Such
somewhere on Innoruuk

p.s. did anyone else see the werewolf flying the black helicopter in
Kithikor Wood?
